channel.title: Look here!
channel.description: ok so the other day i was playing on my m8s server with him and i new a command he didn't ::hide so when i did it he got really pissed off and used somthing on my server and it mega crashed and i couldn't get it to work so i was like wtf did u do [we were speaking over msn] so he said it was a error in 1 of my files and he sent me this program that was gonna fix my server so i thought gr8 it wasnt him just a fault until... i open up the file and there is a . bat filed called filefixer v.1 when i opend it a big box apaered saying u bin h4x3d b1tch then my computer shutdown and when it reopend it worked and i was like few but when it loaded up and that all my files and evrything were gone apart from links like iexploer and outlook express :( :( :( :mad: :mad: :mad: :( :( then when i reinstalled msn and logged in he was still online and said hahhaha u little nub teach u to mess with me u got virused and i used a poc on ur server then went ofline... so i want a download or a link to a poc and/or some links to guides on how to make a virus so i can send it to his email i know his outlook express email so i so wanna crash his server atleast altho i wanna virus him aswell if its against the rules or sumthing to post downloads to them well then can u send me a link to the website for a poc or sumthing or if u no any other ways i can get revenge on him thx alot ps.i dont hack for a living just the only name i could think of at the moment when i made this acc :| :| :|

item.title: Look here!
item.dc:creator: @hacker_00 hacker 00
item.description:
@hacker_00 wrote:

ok so the other day i was playing on my m8s server with him and i new a command he didn’t ::hide so when i did it he got really pissed off and used somthing on my server and it mega crashed and i couldn’t get it to work so i was like wtf did u do [we were speaking over msn] so he said it was a error in 1 of my files and he sent me this program that was gonna fix my server so i thought gr8 it wasnt him just a fault until… i open up the file and there is a . bat filed called filefixer v.1 when i opend it a big box apaered saying u bin h4x3d b1tch then my computer shutdown and when it reopend it worked and i was like few but when it loaded up and that all my files and evrything were gone apart from links like iexploer and outlook express :mad: :mad: :mad:
then when i reinstalled msn and logged in he was still online and said hahhaha u little nub teach u to mess with me u got virused and i used a poc on ur server then went ofline… so
i want a download or a link to a poc and/or some links to guides on how to make a virus so i can send it to his email i know his outlook express email so i so wanna crash his server atleast altho i wanna virus him aswell if its against the rules or sumthing to post downloads to them well then can u send me a link to the website for a poc or sumthing
or if u no any other ways i can get revenge on him
thx alot
ps.i dont hack for a living just the only name i could think of at the moment when i made this acc
